item.title: By: mohsein fazareh
item.dc:creator: mohsein fazareh
item.description:
Hi Thank you for sharing your experiences and apologize for poor english I am writing in
I have a question and that is, How can we calibrate it with a 500 Hz PWM like what we can generate through arduino hardware. to be more clear i want to run a brush less motor with hardware pwm on arduino so I need to calibrate it first but I dont know how I hope to find my answer here thank you again
item.content:encoded:
Hi
Thank you for sharing your experiences and apologize for poor english I am writing in

I have a question and that is, How can we calibrate it with a 500 Hz PWM like what we can generate through arduino hardware.
to be more clear i want to run a brush less motor with hardware pwm on arduino
so I need to calibrate it first but I dont know how
I hope to find my answer here
thank you again

item.title: By: peter
item.dc:creator: peter
item.description: I am having problem while throttling ,all ESC are calibrated at different values ,motor 1 at max.1100microseconds ,min.700us. Motor 2 at max.1590 ,motor 3 at max.1200,motor 4 at 1300. When i throttle motor start at asynchronous way,so quadcopter unbalance. So help me what to do
item.content:encoded: I am having problem while throttling ,all ESC are calibrated at different values ,motor 1 at max.1100microseconds ,min.700us. Motor 2 at max.1590 ,motor 3 at max.1200,motor 4 at 1300. When i throttle motor start at asynchronous way,so quadcopter unbalance. So help me what to do

item.title: By: link
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
hi
good guide , don't understand, the process of calibration need to be done each time system is power up? calibration will be remembered? next time i power system I just need to set speed according to min and max limits settled during calibration?
item.content:encoded:
hi

good guide ,
don’t understand, the process of calibration need to be done each time
system is power up? calibration will be remembered?
next time i power system I just need to set speed according to min and max limits settled during calibration?
